alert.note: Alert for Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 06 at 8:46AM MST until February 07 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 136 AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low humidity, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 136 and 137. * TIMING...Mainly Monday afternoon. * WINDS...Southwest to West 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 50s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start will spread rapidly to the east.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge
